# WhitePages
#### Write-up author: [jon-brandy]()
## DESCRIPTION:
I stopped using YellowPages and moved onto WhitePages... but the page they gave me is all blank!
## HINT:
- NONE
## STEPS:
1. First, download the file given.
2. Next, open the file.
3. When i opened it, it all blanks!

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70703371/180591565-d2cc5927-f76c-4dfa-9e0d-473311898a00.png)

4. But if you press `ctrl + a` it selected a hidden characters.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70703371/180591599-a0b37fc0-ee7b-409e-bfe7-751c90928eb2.png)

5. Then, i tried to open it on vscode.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70703371/180591621-d4ea7242-b481-4d99-84e9-1321a3fb4b7c.png)

6. As you can see, there's a `dot` and `spaces`. What comes to my mind, it might be a binary code.
7. Next, let's change the blank space to `0` and the `dot` character to `1`.
8. For this solution i used vscode, first, block the first space character.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70703371/180591897-cbcf3092-d9d0-490d-b79b-59d3f6833cfb.png)

9. Then go to `edit` , choose `replace`, then enter the value as `0` then choose `replace all`.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70703371/180591831-584c8aed-dad7-461b-83a9-dca035a662d4.png)

10. Now do the same for the `dot` character.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70703371/180591910-9acacd53-69e8-45eb-a03b-88d4a062ae4e.png)

> FINAL RESULT:

```

```

11. I used [this](https://www.convertbinary.com/to-text/) website to convert the binary code to text (ASCII).

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/70703371/180592158-931773a9-ac79-45b1-919d-d3f9ec66f4cc.png)

12. Finally we got the flag!

---
## FLAG

```
picoCTF{not_all_spaces_are_created_equal_3e2423081df9adab2a9d96afda4cfad6}
```
